titles.title: Providing for consideration of a joint resolution appointing the day for the convening of the second session of the One Hundred Eighth Congress.
Providing for consideration of a joint resolution appointing the day for the convening of the second session of the One Hundred Eighth Congress.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-398, by Mr. Diaz-Balart, L..

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 137.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Provides for the consideration of a joint resolution appointing the day for the convening of the second session of the 108th Congress.
